history.proof: split. - intros H. rewrite H. auto. - hfcrush use: Ropp_minus_distr', Rplus_minus, Ropp_minus_distr.

original: split. - intros H. rewrite H. auto. - destruct x. -- destruct y. ++ simpl. intros H. apply f_equal_R with (f := fun t => t * z) in H. simpl in H. rewrite Rmult_comm in H.
